flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
May cause the foe
to fall asleep.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
May cause the foe
to fall asleep.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Demands a kiss with a scary
face that induces sleep.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Demands a kiss with a scary
face that induces sleep.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user forces a
kiss on the foe
with a scary face
that induces sleep.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
With a scary face,
the user forces a
kiss on the foe.
It may make the
target fall asleep.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
With a scary face,
the user forces a
kiss on the foe.
It may make the
target fall asleep.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
With a scary face, the
user tries to force a
kiss on the foe. If it
succeeds, the target
falls asleep.

With a scary face, the user tries to
force a kiss on the target. If it
succeeds, the target falls asleep.
